enb_long_title: Sixteenth Sessions of the Subsidiary Bodies
sentences: Parties considered LDCs in the SBI Plenary Tuesday, 11 June.
The LDC Expert Group (LEG) Chair Bubu Jallow (Gambia) remarked on the LEG`s proposed work programme (FCCC/SBI/2002/5).
Mali supported prioritizing the implementation of national adaptation programmes of action (NAPAs).
The EU said the LEG should focus on strategic activities where it has a comparative advantage. Draft conclusions were presented to the SBI Plenary on Friday, 14 June, and adopted without amendment.
